Fatboy Mutator -- for the UT demo.

Author: JbP
Idea: Epic

Handling instructions: 

Download and unzip. Extract both files into your tournamentdemo\system 
directory. Load up Unreal Tournament Demo, start practice session, click
on the "mutators" button, and double-click fatboy to include it in your 
botmatch.

Legal: Use it, don't make money out of it.
